snippet: Marvin Nicholson, the White House travel director, who has played golf with the president about 140 times, rounds out the president’s foursomes and soothes his frayed feelings.
abstract: Profile of Marvin Nicholson, White House travel director, who has become Pres Obama's most frequent golf partner; Nicholson is known for having a soothing effect on both Obama and others around him.
lead_paragraph: Marvin Nicholson, the White House travel director, who has played golf with the president about 140 times, rounds out the president’s foursomes and soothes his frayed feelings.

headline.main: Challenging the President ... but Only on the Golf Course
headline.print_headline: Challenging the President ... but Only on the Golf Course
